name: Chess (itch) (Camdenvaughan)
description:
Like many people I got really into chess after watching the Queen's Gambit! I started by following a tutorial from The Game Dev Chef (linked at bottom) but then took it much farther by adding other menus, a pause system, a settings page, camera system, some left out chess rules (ie. En Passant, Promotion to any piece type) and even a system that displays Chess Notation!

Really happy how it turned out, and I was very proud that I figured out all the extra systems by myself.

Game Dev Chef Tutorial
